name: Kondo Isami [Party]
skill: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by 39%/47% for a limited time.
ability: Sharply increase attack speed, at the same time sharply reduce DMG taken.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the man who led the swordsmen that once protected Kyoto. Putting the Special Police Force through rigorous training day after day, his pride in the organization grew to overconfidence. But Okita Soji was able to convince him of the value in accepting help from others when they have similar goals. Their cooperation should serve as a shining example for spirits and spirit agents alike for generations to come.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Ghost in the Mirror" Event: Clear Chapter 4
◦ "Ghost in the Mirror" Event: Exchange for 5000 Mirror Shard
◦ "Ghost in the Mirror" Event: Get a First Half Ranking of 2501-6000.
◦ "Ghost in the Mirror" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 5001-7500.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Mirror Shard during the "Ghost in the Mirror" event.

main: "No one beats the Special Police Force in terms of teamwork."
